V

value - Variable in class Model.Cards.Card
 
Value - Enum Class in Model.Cards
All the values of Uno Card,
values are associate to their points value
and the scheme is like so: Values Points ZERO to NINE 0-9 SKIP 20 REVERSE 20 DRAW 20 WILD 50 WILD DRAW 50

Customize the ViewRotatableCard to add a shift Dimension used when drawing.

viewPlayer - Variable in class Controller.MainFrameController
 
ViewPlayer - Class in View.Elements
Class used to provide the Player a graphic representation, with its profile picture CircularImage and its hand with ViewAnimableCard
ViewPlayer(Player) - Constructor for class View.Elements.ViewPlayer
Creates a new ViewPlayer with the given Player and the default CircularImage
ViewPlayer(Player, CircularImage) - Constructor for class View.Elements.ViewPlayer
Creates a new ViewPlayer with the given Player and CircularImage
viewPlayerClick(MouseEvent) - Method in class Controller.GamePanelController
Based on the click coordinates on the view, it checks if user has clicked on:
- UNO
- another player if exposable
- continue or exit game
- a card to draw
- a card to play
- skip turn
viewPlayers - Variable in class View.Pages.GamePanel
 
ViewRotatableCard - Class in View.Elements
Customize the ViewCard to provide the rotation needed by the ViewCard when displayed on screen.
ViewRotatableCard() - Constructor for class View.Elements.ViewRotatableCard
Creates a new ViewRotatableCard with the default BACK_CARD image.
ViewRotatableCard(Card) - Constructor for class View.Elements.ViewRotatableCard
Creates a new ViewRotatableCard of the given Card and no rotation
ViewRotatableCard(Card, int) - Constructor for class View.Elements.ViewRotatableCard
Creates a new ViewRotatableCard of the given Card and the given rotation If the rotation is not 0, then the painted image is chosen between the rotated back_card images based on the rotation.
ViewSlider - Class in View.Elements
Class used to customize a JProgressBar.
ViewSlider() - Constructor for class View.Elements.ViewSlider
Creates a new ViewSlider with the common attributes
